useCase.name: Update Dish Allergens

preconditions.precondition: The Chef wants to update allergens for a dish.

useCase.trigger: The Chef selects a dish to update allergens.

mainSequence.step: The Chef selects a dish to update allergens.
The Restaurant Management System requests dish details.
The Menu Management Subsystem queries dish ingredients.
The Menu Management Subsystem displays ingredients with allergy information.
The Restaurant Management System shows ingredients and current allergy list to the Chef.
The Chef adds or removes allergens to/from the list.
The Restaurant Management System updates allergy information.
The Menu Management Subsystem updates dish ingredient allergy information in the Database.
The Menu Management Subsystem confirms the update to the Chef.
The Restaurant Management System displays update confirmation to the Chef.
